data.title: 以 3 到 5 分钟描写以下主题
data.content: There are many different types of craft, such as woodworking, knitting, embroidery, and pottery. What type of craft would you be interested in pursuing? Explain why you would choose one form of craft over others.
data.answer: There are many different types of crafts, such as woodworking, knitting, embroidery, and pottery. If I were to choose a craft that I am interested in pursuing, I would choose woodworking. Woodworking is a real skill that can benefit me and those around me. This new skill can be applied however I see fit because wood is everywhere in our life. Think about how many things are made out of wood, and it quickly becomes apparent that the possibilities are endless with this material. Not only can I build practically anything out of wood, but I can also choose the type of wood and color and apply whatever finish I see fit.
